name: Extreme Boat Drive Fun
description:
If you love blue water boat games then enjoy this new breed of water racing games. Extreme boat drive Fun is super-fast and most popular 3D motorboat racer game. For all who love fast water boat. This game contains lots of challenging missions and fastest Jet Ski! Which can you ride and win your challenging missions. Driving a boat in water racing games and a boat game is typically exciting and very challenging.
Ride your Jet Ski through sea, races your Jet Ski with realistic physics, eye-popping, and breathtaking Jet Ski stunts on ramp. Get the amazing experience of extreme boat with our new water boat racer. This boat rider offers a thrilling mix of crazy stunts and intense challenge.
Not only you will have to be the driver of water boat, you will have to ride across the circles in stunning levels of this game using your boat riding skills to unlock other levels. If you leave any circle while riding then your level is incomplete. So! Your first priority is that ride your boat across all circles. You’ll ride your boat struggle to retain control and reach the finish line in specific time. This water boat racer will give you the real experience of controlling a water motorbike race as the stunning ramp environment realistically simulates beach water and waves for your boat to perform crazy stunt and become a real boat wave runner.
